section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: Represents a button that extends the VirtButton class.
The Button class provides functionality to read the state of a button, update the internal state machine, and perform initialization.

section.title: pressFor()[1/2]
section.para: Returns the duration in milliseconds for which the button has been pressed. If the EB_NO_PEDOMETER macro is defined, the function always returns 0. If the button is not currently pressed, the function also returns 0.

formalpara.title: Returns
formalpara.para: The duration in milliseconds for which the button has been pressed.
